description: Now that you're producing energy in the medium voltage tier, you'll need to make sure your machines can accept that new found power. Normally, cables wont even connect to machines if they aren't of the same tier. But, by placing an /b/Advanced Machine Hull/b/, or a higher tier of hull, into the slot in the top right of the machine, you'll have upgraded the machine to the tier of power it associated with that new hull. By default, electric machines are already at the /b/Basic Machine Hull/b/ tier and there is no need to put basic machine hulls into the slot. I'll show you which hulls are for which power tier.
• Advanced Machine Hulls are for Medium Voltage.
• Turbo Machine Hulls are for High Voltage.
• Highly Advanced Machine Hulls are for Extreme Voltage.
Make sure you check which of your machines --actually-- need the upgrades so you aren't wasting resorces on machines that dont really need the extra boost.
